entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Checked JIT: "BBF_HAS_IDX_LEN is not set" assert #61705
    7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] We should enforce that services packages specify `ServicingVersion` when in a servicing release. #61694
    6.0.x
  • Mono jit/hardwareintrinsics/x86/x86base/pause tests failing #61693
  • Race condition writing Microsoft.Interop.DllImportGenerator.dll during library product build (Windows x64 Release) #61687
  • [Mono] Add support for DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute #61685
    7.0.0
  • BindToDirectory throws NullReferenceException on Linux when LdapConnection AuthType is Anonymous #61683
  • sigsegv crash on macos net50 aspnetcore #61702
  • Performance Regression in Concurrent (Stack/Queue)? #61673
  • [mini] gshared: Implement static virtual method `constrained.ldftn` in the JIT #61672
    7.0.0
  • A self-built crossgen2 hangs on some recent Linux distributions #61671
  • Add support for clearing ConfigurationManager sources (was possible in version 5) #61675
  • Garbage collection method is not manageable by environment variables in .net 6 #61674
  • Avoid need for pragma warning disables in Regex source generator #61666
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Handle exceptions while evaluating expressions #61665
  • Performance Improvement: Value Range Test #61664
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest222\\Generated222\\Generated222.cmd #61647
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_speed_rellcsbox\\_speed_rellcsbox.cmd #61646
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.IncrementalGenerationTests.ChangingMarshallingStrategy_RegeneratesStub #61643

Closed

  • SSL/TLS handshake fails in Ubuntu 20.04 and Net 5.0 using mysql server container #59986
    7.0.0
  • Supported Versions in SslStream #61051
    7.0.0
  • Decode content-disposition header #61197
    7.0.0
  • [.NET 6] UriBuilder breaking change not documented #61363
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.GetCustomAttribute(Type) returns null on .Net5 #61661
  • HTTP/3: InvalidOperationException with many streams on a connection #55249
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json SignalR Hub issue #61648
  • Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_ADD, GT_SUB)' in 'Matrix:GetHashCode():int:this' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 96) #61629
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Byte #61374
    7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] HostActivationTest has been crashing on macOS #61636
    6.0.x
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59061
    7.0.0
  • Pin FileVersions in platform manifest for the ref packs in the servicing #61216
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [DllImportGenerator] Enable on projects without System.Memory and System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe #61704
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add packaging changes for System.Text.Json #61703
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove some unnecessary slicing from generated Regex code #61701
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Upload dasm files as artifacts #61700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore missing data result from superpmi-replay run #61699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add single char lazy loop support to simplified Regex code gen #61698
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable native ports package validation #61697
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] DRAFT #61696
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove race condition from DllImportGenerator build #61695
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove XUnit reference metadata from tests I switched over last week #61691
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout and add env var option #61688
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • File.CopyTo: try to pre-allocate disk space for large destination files #61676
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Follow up changes for 61590 #61670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS (#61590) #61659
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Remove `DisableImplicitNamespaceImports_DotNet` #61656
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #61655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Include hashes of containing types when computing hash in EEClassHashTable #61652
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area-owners to reflect Libraries Area Pod changes #61642
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Create runtime clone to manually kick off full test runs #61641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update SPCL to use GeneratedDllImport where possible. #61640
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Merged

  • Generate .runsettings file to be able to run and debug tests on vscode in codespace with prebuild #61684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [arm64] JIT: Make 0.0 containable for fcmp #61617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop ignoring QCalls when looking for methods to convert to GeneratedDllImport #61678
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable activation host tests that fail with a 6.0 RC2 or newer SDK #61654
    area-Host
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1472678 #61680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.IO.Compression, System.IO.Compression.Brotli, System.Net.Http, System.Net.NameResolution #61638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61614
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Update WASM README.md #61681
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Improvement of memory consumption while Evaluating Expressions #61470
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Rework fetch #61639
  • Fix poisoning for very large structs #61521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable fgMorphCastedBitwiseOp opt for floats #61657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SuperPMI Python script Azure usage #61650
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stabilize upgrade codes for host msi #61606
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Give create codespaces prebuild action right permissions #61651
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stabilize upgrade code and dependency key for host msi #61619
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61430
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Add tests for CNG key algorithm mismatches #61211
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • XArch: Trim the code block to match the actual code length #61523
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Only run JIT formatting job if there are JIT changes #61632

Updated

  • JIT: don't import IL for partial compilation blocks #61572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upload checked JITs for Release branches and introduce jitmap.txt #61597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms to System.Security.Cryptography #61543
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update docker image #61217
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #61631
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] renames and cleanup before modularization #61596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 3 #61435
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add a JsonWriterOptions.MaxDepth property #61608
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout to thirty seconds #61621
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add [Fact] attributes to all remaining ilproj tests #61625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Tie sdb agent lifetime to the ExecutionContext and simplify the api #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix the inclusion of generic instances when doing profile… #61627
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add nested static attribute support. #61508
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DRAFT][private] Fix xunit xharness fails #61595
    arch-wasm
  • Minor File.ReadAllBytes* improvements #61519
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Avoid computing a vtable arg for ctors which don't need it. #61512
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable DD117522 test #61585
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: code generation for modifying arg locals looks broken in RyuJIT->LLVM backend #1729

Closed

  • Improve trimmed-metadata exception message #1712

PullRequests

Merged

  • Scan field RVA data blobs #1728
    area-NativeAOT
  • Reduce diffs with runtime repo in src/tests #1727
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for more unary and binary ops #1705

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Recent System.CommandLine upgrade broke source-build in 6.0.2xx #22640
  • Inconsistent error code for NETSDK1174 #22639
  • dotnet tools GUI for vs code user #22637
  • Warn when using deprecated Nuget packages #22635
  • Add NET6_0_OR_GREATER preprocessor directive #22625
  • Controlling dependency assets in referenced projects #22627
  • Cannot debug asp.net core 6.0 project, in Visual Studio 2022 (Windows 10) #22628
  • VS 2022 New ASP .NET Core Web Project fails to start with "Process with an id of xx is not running" #22629

Closed

  • ImplicitUsings is not work in ProjectReference #22621
  • Manually change Framework in runtimeconfig.json? #22128
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use MessageImportance.Low for log statements. #22638
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Change messages for ILLink #22636
    Area-ILLink
  • [Razor] Fix some pack tests and skip a failing test #22631
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Do not advertise workload updates on run output #22573
    Area-Workloads
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22542
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use MessageImportance.Low for log statements. #22616
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22501
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Tell user when workload has already been installed #22557
    Area-Workloads
  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 as 1604 goes out of support soon #17260
  • Update Test project x64SolutionBuild to current framework #22532
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.Semantics.BinaryOperators.TestLargeStringConcatenation is flaky #57806
  • [Proposal] GetAllTypesByMetadataName #57802
    17.1
  • Tab completion in VS2022 not complying with code style #57800
  • Test AsyncIteratorWithAwaitAndYieldAndAwait is flaky #57797
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57789
  • Introduce "use implicit array creation" analyzer #57788

Closed

  • CS8602 (dereference of a possible null reference) when using method group, but not when using lambda #57753
  • VS crashes on pasting a specific code snippet into it #57762
  • Disallow a discard assigns to another discard #57791
  • It looks like LocalRewriter.VisitInterpolatedString method assumes that overload resolution necessary picks a Format method that returns string #53005
    17.1
  • InvalidCastException in ValueTracking #57100
    17.1
  • Nullability for [NotNull] input arguments that are assigned #57793
  • 'is not' and [DoesNotReturn] #57798
  • Please expose Compilation.GetBestTypeByMetadataName as a public API #52399
    17.1
  • Stack overflow while binding an InternalsVisibleTo attribute #57742
  • Method inference issue with extension methods that have lamdas as argument when the class implementation contains a method overload with object argument. #57759
  • Update tests for NoneOperation with type #57531
    17.1
  • [LSP] Investigate moving taskcompletionsource to queue item instead of callbacks #57221
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing test for CallerArgumentExpression #57805
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57804
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove weakref that telemetry indicates has no impact at all. #57803
    Area-IDE
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade6) #57801
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the title of configure severity to resources file #57795
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57784
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix ValueTracking for index parameters #57727
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't throw exceptions for file changes after a project is unloaded #57782
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57754
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57785
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Avoid accessing current assembly identity while reporting an accessibility diagnostics for an inaccessible internal symbol. #57783
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57787
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix null ref in navbars #57778
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Load SVsShellDebugger before calling IVsSolution.CreateSolution #57765
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57775
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57774
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure that getting the checksum for a project cone is resilient to its project references being missing #57776
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57718
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Include a type for NoneOperations in VB, print the type in tests #57664
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move the task completion source for a queue item into the queue item itself. #57617
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next

Updated

  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57807
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Simplify code for producing project-id list #57772
    Area-IDE
  • Run HasRefactoringsAsync out-of-process #40672
    Area-IDE
  • Switch liveshare to use LSP pull diagnostics and cleanup server name usages #57596
    Area-IDE, LSP, UX Review Not Required
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57732
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade7) #57637
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Shorten paths in VS installation #57726
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why was the "Individual User Accounts" option removed? #38457
  • Blazor WebAssembly Hot Reload does not work if body tag is incorrect #38454
  • Blazor WebAssembly crashes on mobile devices with low RAM #38452
  • Make IValueProvider async #38451
  • Img tags do not receive scope identifier in .Net 6 MVC Core #38450
  • UsePathBase being ignored #38448
  • Productize the custom elements support package #38447
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel Timeouts and Rates which are disabled under a debugger are undocumented #38446
  • Enable integration with 3rd party assets management solutions #38445
    .NET 7 Planning
  • problem converting a 3.1 core app to 6.0, routing is using more than 12-13 gig of ram #38444
  • Need to bring back cookie interop test coverage in some form #38443
    6.0.x
  • Optional parameter defaults in Controller Method are ignored. #38440
  • Virtualize scrolling is broken when using display:grid on panel and display:content on rows #38439
    Discussions
  • When using .net core 3.1 runtime with System.Text.Json 6.0.0 the serialization doesn't honor new API. #38438
  • Prevent ASP.NET Core SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38437
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .NET 6 Minimal API - WebApplicationFactory doesn't see custom settings json file values #38435
  • Cookies rejected while switching to minimal hosting model syntax #38434
    6.0.x
  • Blazor and .NET6 creates an error: EntrypointInvoker in assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly #38436
  • A type with name ... does not exist #38449
  • Blazor publish cannot access file because it's being compressed multiple times #38429
    Discussions
  • ScopedServices property of OwningComponentBase may not be disposed. #38424
  • Blazor action and function object type is not disposed. #38423

Closed

  • PageTitle Not Working with .Net 6.0 Blazor wasm project migrated from .Net 5.0 #38356
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Scaffold component with form or table for model class #32902
    Backlog
  • Code generation for setting Blazor component parameters #36071
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `Ctrl +R` doesn't include renamed file in hot reload session #31728
    .NET 7 Planning
  • VS4Mac seems to be unreliable with dotnet-watch #34621
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [HotReload][BlazorWASM]: Adding an attribute to InputSelect results in a rude edit #36582
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Port WebAssembly in .Net 6 RC2: The top level app must directly references to the assemblies used by it's referenced assemblies to 6.0.1xx #38220
    6.0.x
  • Blazor Wasm Azure AppService ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT ignored #28573
    6.0-docs-infra
  • dotnet run --project ignores launchsettings #38397
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor in production: can't find bindings module assembly: System.Private.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #38433
  • Change the log level for static web assets to Minimal #37779
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cannot validate service provider on default WebApplicationBuilder in ASP.NET Core 6.0 #38334
  • Blazor Components ILogger no longer receives class type. 5.0->6.0 #37887
  • ::deep Not Working in Blazor .NET 6 #38339
  • VS2022 Release Blazor calling my OnParametersSetAsync 4 times on the same control #38350
  • Allow developers to use Dependency Injection within components the same way DotNetCore does with everything else. #38385
  • Replacing dotnet.wasm #38401
  • CSS Isolation not works for nested CSS selector #38377
  • Resources built for razor library are not copied to publish folder #38374
  • Single file build time regression: proxy-yarp, proxy-yarp #37957
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, json, json #37956
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37868
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37805
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #37001
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, json, proxy-yarp #35629
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext, proxy-yarp #32932
  • Single file build time improvement: json #32917
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext, proxy-yarp, proxy-yarp #32916
  • Single file build time regression: json #32732
  • Single file build time improvement: json, json, json, plaintext #32717
  • Single file build time regression: json, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #32716
  • Single file build time regression: json #32669

PullRequests

Created

  • Try Ubuntu 21.10 #38456
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38427
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove remaining System.Net.Http 4.1.0 reference #38441
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21558.2 #38417
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Grant GitHub actions explicit permissions #38422
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Let VS Code do its thing #38388
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Grant GitHub actions explicit permissions #38421
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • [main] Grant GitHub actions explicit permissions #38420
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38412
    3.1.x
  • Update yarn.lock #38418
    area-blazor
  • Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38409

Updated

  • Override base implementations of WriteLineAsync in HttpResponseStreamWriter #38387
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-alpha1
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Verify Roslyn compiler changes #38362
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement Rows/Columns on Editor and Deprecate AutoSize #3429
    .NET 7
  • Editor inside VerticalStackLayout automatically grows vertically on Android/WinUI but not on iOS #3425
  • its Impossible to do more than one MAUI-Library Project into a Solution in VS2022 RC !! #3424
  • Maui manifest is not signed at maui check at net 6.0.100 rc3 #3423
  • Error NU1605 after upgrading to 17.1.0 Preview 1.0 #3422
  • VS17.1Prv1: Maui default solution loads of errors #3421
  • .net MAUI app not building #3420
  • VS17.1Prv1: MAUI fails default project build even after updating manually via maui-check & template update #3419
  • MAUI Project Template Has Build Errors #3417
  • VS2022 17.0.1 P1 Can't build MAUI sample project #3416
  • Xamarin Maui DisplayAlert does not appear (no message display pop-up) when using NavigationPage #3415
  • VS17.1prv1 - WeatherTwentyOne app error #3414
  • [Bug] [iOS] IsVisible doesn't work for custom controls which inherits from View #3410
  • [Bug] Visual Studio does not debug Android app with Name property on ActivityAttribute #3407
  • [Bug] 'DllNotFoundException: libcoreclr.so' when I attempt to perform a login through iOS #3406

Closed

  • Use Microsoft Edge HTML/CSS renderer as self-contained in Blazor MAUI apps #3390
  • MAUI Need recipe on android when uncomment windows project #3242
  • [Bug] WinUI: Entry.Text is always null #2877
  • ContentProperty attribute ignored if base type is a Collection #3251
  • We can no longer be complacent like Ballmer's period. A truly powerful company does not rely on monopoly, but on technological innovation. Therefore, we suggest that it is very necessary to support Linux #3404
  • [Enhancement] Update DatePicker and TimePicker to use DateOnly and TimeOnly structs #1847
  • We can no longer be complacent like Ballmer's period. A truly powerful company does not rely on monopoly, but on technological innovation. Therefore, we suggest that it is very necessary to support Linux #3408
  • We can no longer be complacent like Ballmer's period. A truly powerful company does not rely on monopoly, but on technological innovation. Therefore, we suggest that it is very necessary to support Linux #3405
  • [Bug] 6.0.100-rc.1.1528 is not found in NuGet feeds #2840
  • [Bug] Updating Image Properties through Code-Behind does not reflect in UI. #2153
    6.0.101-preview.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Build projects in parallel #3428
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add `repro.md` to issue template #3427
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Button border properties #3409
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • Update issue template version boxes #3426
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove the temporary patch #3418
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix GitHub actions #3413
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Update issue templates to use GitHub forms (beta) #3320
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [WiP] Fix Scoping of MauiContext as it relates to Modal Pages #3361
    do-not-merge
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • MAUI 395 port editor Autosize to handler #1202
    do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools
  • Use the Default Button Styles (Windows 11 Styles) #3363
  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [Core] Rename XXXServiceProviders to XXXFactories #3368
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨
  • Minimal changes required to support RemoteWebView #2469

  • Added dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375

  • Init Essentials #3345
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporal Tables support for InMemoryDatabase #26717
  • Reverse Engineering issue with user permissions #26716
  • NorthwindSplitIncludeQuery test depend on specific implicit ordering and are hard to fix #26715
    7.0.0
  • Update Attach docs to reference cascade delete/delete orphans timing #26718
    MQ
  • Incorrect optional dependent (owned type) warning when saving optional dependent with the _same_ data #26712
  • NotMapped property's entitytype getting added to modelBuilder.Model #26709
    7.0.0
  • Stop generating composite keys for owned collections on SQLite #26708
    7.0.0
  • TemporalAll() in Temporal Tables with child entity gives System.InvalidOperationException when used with Include() #26704
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection... using Union or Concat #26703
  • Method not found: 'System.Type Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.ITypeBase.get_ClrType()'. #26701

Closed

  • How to resolve an IExecutionStrategy? #26710
  • Proxies using Records with a base class broken since .NET 6 #26602
  • SqliteCommand._preparedStatements list initialized with 0 capacity #26294
    7.0.0
  • SqliteCommand.GetStatements unnecessarily gets parameter count for prepared statement #26298
    7.0.0
  • SqliteConnection.Open/Close allocate StateChangeEventArgs per every call #26283
    7.0.0
  • Query: model building for temporal table with explicitly defined period columns could fail if conventions are executed in a delayed fashion #26705
  • InvalidOperationException "sequence contains no matching element" in TableReferenceExpression.get_Table #26587
    6.0.1
  • Bug in EFCore under .NET 6 when using records with inheritance and lazy loading #26714
  • filtered include generates invalid SQL with First() but not with ToList() #26585
  • Running dotnet ef global tool in .NET 6 on Mac with M1 raises: Failed to load /usr/local/share/dotnet/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/3.1.20/libhostpolicy.dylib #26650
  • Update C# Documentation to give unit testing examples #26589
  • Manual DetectChanges() call does not take navigation properties into account #26554
  • [6.0][CosmosDB] DateTime with z suffix is not respected when reading entities. #26690
    6.0.1
  • [Q] Complex data as value of Annotation #26655
  • Invalid SQL generated for SQL server when grouping by complex (calculated) properties #26654
  • Stack overflow when using circular composite key dependencies #26629
    6.0.1
  • Bundle-Migration failing #26501
  • efcore6 produces wrong SELECT SQL when Where/OrderBy clauses are applied to Owned properties followed by .Take() #26592
    7.0.0
  • efcore 6 bundle error #26479
  • .NET 6 InMemoryDatabase RowVersion required on adding new record #26649

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Adding support for owned types mapped to same table as well as different tables #26706

Merged

  • Remove quirks from main #26711
  • Cache ParamCount together with a statement for SQLite #26380
  • Set default capacity of prepared Statements #26514
  • Cache Eventargs in SQLiteConnection #26291
    community-contribution
  • Evolve null-checking approach in SQLite provider #26535
  • [6.0.x] Cosmos: Use configured serializer when reading #26702
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1

Updated

  • Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • Fix some markdown language syntax highlights #26680
    community-contribution
  • Query: Avoid parethesis around binary operations when used with AND/OR #26661

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET 6 installer fails builds of Azure Function projects on macOS #11951
  • Language of installer does not match display language #2453
    backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable F# tests that should work now. #12686
  • Remove un-needed version properties #12683

Merged

  • [main] Merge from release/6.0.2xx #12674
  • Looks like our logic for the RID for WindowsDesktop was merged incorrectly into 6.0 #12657
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
  • Resolve Component Governance alerts #12604
  • Add bootstrap build to CI #12651
  • Enable targeting 5.0 for arm64 #12675
